ygData.subject: Re: Firedrill/Headstrong
ygData.msgSnippet: Headstrong leapt towards the Autobot standing in his way of the downed Protectobot. Snort, you die Autobot, then them Snort He growled. He swung his blade

From: gestalt_menasor@...

Headstrong leapt towards the Autobot standing in his way of the downed 
Protectobot. "Snort, you die Autobot, then them Snort" He growled. He 
swung his blade wide, as did the other mirror images. 

Firedrill was not sure which one was swinging, and tried to put up his 
shield plating arms against the two furthest Headstrongs. Both blades 
passed harmlessly through his arms, and he realised with horror what 
came next. He tried to quickly change his arms, but it was too late, 
three more blades harmlessly passed through him, as one stuck straight 
through his shoulder. He screamed out in pain.

Headstrong spread his feet for grip on the ground, then put his other 
hand on the blade, and strained to send the robot straight up and 
behind him. He flung Firedrill off his sword, and the Autobot hit the 
ground with a sickening thud. He then turned to First Aid, and swung 
to take his head off.
